Block.Text: {C1}All Warriors have finished their turns. Advance to the next month?{End}
{C1}Are you sure you want to dismiss {Color:31}|02,3c,64{C1}{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}Are you sure you want to let {Color:31}|02,3c,64{C1}{Color:33} go?{End}
{C1}Select Warriors to take into battle against {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}Are you ready to begin battle against {Area}{C1}?{End}
{C1}Are you sure you want to begin the battle?{End}
{C1}Do you wish to save your progress?{End}
{C1}Quit this story and return to story selection?{End}
{C1}Your save data has not been deleted, so you will be unable to save during play. Continue?{End}
{C1}Are you sure you want to cancel calling in reinforcements?{End}
{C1}Are you sure you want to delete all save data?{End}
{C1}The story will not be recorded as cleared if you do not save your progress. Continue?{End}
{C1}The battle has been won! Save progress?{End}
{C1}Saving will not be possible from this point. Are you ready to continue?{End}
{Name2}{C1}'s army has appeared in |02,51,64{C1}'s kingdom of {Area}{C1}!{End}
{Name2}{C1}'s army has challenged the kingdom of {Area}{C1} to battle!{End}
{C1}There are no Warriors who can fight in {Area}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Color:30}|02,3c,64{C1}{Color:33}'s army has been defeated and has been forced to retreat.{End}
{C1}{Color:31}|02,3c,64{C1}{Color:33}'s army has been defeated and has been forced to retreat.{End}
{C1}You have reached the maximum permitted number of Warriors in this kingdom. Select Warriors to replace.{End}
{C1}Are you sure you want to unequip this item?{End}
{Name2}{C1} has reached the maximum permitted number of Pokémon. Select a Pokémon to let go.{End}
{C1}You have reached the maximum permitted number of Warriors in this kingdom. Select a castle in which to deploy new recruits.{End}
{C1}You cannot go into battle without {Name}{C1} and {Color:31}Oichi{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}Try going into battle once {Name}{C1} and {Color:31}Oichi{Color:33} have been deployed in the same castle.{End}
{C1}At least one famous Warrior has not been selected. Continue?{End}
{C1}In which castle would you like to deploy {Color:31}|02,3c,64{C1}{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}You have reached the maximum permitted number of Warriors. Select a Warrior to dismiss.{End}
{C1}This time, all Warriors must be selected in order to go into battle.{End}
{C1}Select a maximum of three Warriors to go into battle against {Area}{C1}. {End}
{C1}Save data has not been deleted. The game cannot be saved.{End}
{C1}Saving... {C1}Do not turn off the power or touch the Game Card.{End}
{C1}Cannot write save data. Turn off the power, remove and reinsert the Game Card, and then try again. {End}
{C1}The data cannot be read. Turn off the power, remove and reinsert the Game Card, and then try again. {End}
{C1}Saving... {C1}Do not turn off the power or touch the Game Card.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon Conquest save data is corrupted and will be reformatted.{End}
{C1}Reformatting save data... {C1}Do not turn off the power or touch the Game Card.{End}
{C1}Deleting save data... {C1}Do not turn off your system or touch the Game Card.{End}
{C1}Combine two items to form a new item. {End}
{C1}Relax in the forest to temporarily improve Warriors' stats.{End}
{C1}Absorb a mysterious energy to temporarily improve Warriors' stats.{End}
{C1}Train together with your Pokémon in order to raise their Energy. {End}
{C1}Increase Pokémon's Energy by feeding them ponigiri.{End}
{C1}Go panning in the River of Gold. {End}
{C1}Summon Pokémon using a mysterious electrical power.{End}
{C1}Use the airship to send Warriors to other kingdoms. {End}
{C1}Change your Pokémon's Abilities using the power of the Mystery Springs. {End}
{C1}Are you a boy or a girl?{End}
{C1}Your name will be set as {Color:31}%s{Color:33}. Is this right?{End}
{C1}{Color:32}Wireless Play{Color:33} and the {Color:32}Gallery{Color:33} have become available to select!{End}
{C1}In the {Color:32}Gallery{Color:33} you can find records of all Warriors―and their Pokémon―with whom you have won battles.{End}
{C1}If you save your game while that Warrior is in your army, all their Pokémon will be added to the {Color:32}Gallery{Color:33}. {End}
{C1}Go to the {Color:32}Gallery{Color:33} to check the information about the Warriors that have been added. Warriors added to the {Color:32}Gallery{Color:33} can be used in Wireless Play. {End}
{C1}When using {Color:32}Wireless Play{Color:33}, you can select which Warriors to use from those in the {Color:32}Gallery{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}What would you like to invest in?{End}
{C1}Where would you like to march from?{End}
{C1}Who would you like to take part?{End}
{C1}This location is at its maximum level.{End}
{C1}No Warriors available to go into battle. {End}
{C1}From which kingdom would you like to send reinforcements?{End}
{C1}Who would you like to send as reinforcements?{End}
{C1}Nobody available to whom you can delegate.{End}
{C1}Collect a total of {Color:32}100{Color:33} or more partner Pokémon for the Warriors in your army.{End}
{C1}Collect a total of {Color:32}100{Color:33} or more partner Pokémon for the Warriors in your army.{End}
{C1}Collect a total of {Color:32}100{Color:33} or more partner Pokémon for the Warriors in your army.{End}
{C1}Collect a total of {Color:32}100{Color:33} or more partner Pokémon for the Warriors in your army.{End}
{C1}You are now able to play Keiji's story, {Color:32}The Free Spirit's Path{Color:33}. {Color:30}This story becomes available for play only once you have cleared the game.{Color:33}{End}
{C1}The password was recognized, but certain events have not yet occurred. Please try inputting the password once again when the events have occurred.{End}
{C1}The password you entered has already been used.{End}
{C1}All Warriors who have not been delegated tasks have completed their turns. Proceed to next month?{End}
